cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper deals with document recognition on mobile devices using video stream input, which involves computer vision (CV) techniques. The focus is on improving the recognition precision, which falls under the category of information retrieval (IR). The paper also discusses text string recognition, which is a common task in natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (CL). The proposed method involves weighting criteria, which is a common technique in machine learning (ML) and data mining (DM). Finally, the paper provides experimental data for verifying the validity and effectiveness of the proposed method, which is a common practice in multimedia (MM) research.
